message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $14000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire an item valued at $12000 by you, while also providing me with a satisfactory return. I believe this price offers a fair balance between value and compensation.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. This would be a more comfortable price for me, considering the value you mentioned the product has for me.
